One day, while searching for things in his attic, Eddie found a remote.
Does he use it now? or wait till later?

11.content:
With all of those buttons, Eddie came to the conclusion that it must be some sort of universal remote. It looked a bit old, since it seemed to have no numbered buttons--just colors. Perhaps it was for some toy rather than a TV?

Regardless, he pocketed the remote and continued looking around the attic. Boxes were strewn across the ground, with random labels written on. First grade, old toys, some board games--everything in his and his sister's entire life seemed to be here. He cursed his mother for making him look for a stupid rat that she supposedly heard. It's no wonder he couldn't find the rodent: it had shelter from all the boxes lying around. Eddie knew the task was hopeless, so he took the next best thing to do--lie. There were probably tons of rats up here, anyway.

"Oh, mom, you should see this rat! The mouse trap it fell on cut it in half! You can see it's--"

"Please! Eddie! Just take it outside!"

Eddie smiled. His mother was deathly afraid of anything living that wasn't a human, and she wouldn't come near him if he had a dead one on hand. Quickly walking outside, he stood out there for a while. Even though he didn't do anything, his mother would probably waive him of his chores for today because of this event. After a few minutes, he walked up to his room and pulled out the remote he found earlier.

Eddie...

choices: He heads back up to his room.
He decided to go out himself.
He follows his mom to work.
12.content:
"Yeah right, like this thing is going to work on anything" Eddie muttered skeptically, holding the remote in his hand and studying it in detail. He then made his way out of the attic and went downstairs, where his mom was fixing herself something to eat before heading to work.

"Hi honey, want some breakfast?" his mother asked in a cheery tone.

"No I'm not hungry, thanks mom" Eddie responded, as he thought about whether to actually try and use this strange looking remote on his own mom.

"Hell with it" he finally sighed, aiming and firing....Zzzaaappp!!! He pressed the black & white button...

After a flash of light, Eddie looked in amazement at his mother, who now seemed to wearing clothes exactly like his. And after another few seconds...Eddie realized they were HIS clothes, now altered in size to fit his mother's body. He looked down at himself and gasped, seeing he was now wearing his mom's white blouse, her black pencil skirt, pantyhose, underwear and her 2-inch heel black patent pumps.

"Holy crap!!" Eddie blurted out, stumbling slightly in the heels he now wore.

"What's wrong sweetie?" his mother replied, turning to face him with a frown on her face.

"Huh? Oh...nothing mom, never mind!" Eddie mumbled in reply, as he dug his mom's panties out of his crack.

"Okay well, I'm off to work in a minute okay, there's still some pizza left over from last night if you get hungry before you head to school" his mother smiled. She didn't seem to think anything was weird about the fact that she was now wearing her teenage son's clothes...and he was wearing hers.

"Ok, thanks mom!" Eddie grinned, as he inspected his new clothing more closely, including the bra that was now fastened around his torso, with nothing to fill the cups. His thin, hairy legs looked quite unsightly clad in his mother's nylon pantyhose.

The sight of his mother's large, D-Cup breasts swinging loose underneath his t-shirt actually made Eddie laugh as he watched his mom walking around the kitchen. The he said goodbye to her as she left for work, he then had the house all to himself, at least for the time being.

134211.content:
At dinner, Eddie's sister was unusually quiet and shy, sullenly pushing around the vegetables on her plate while barely eating anything.

“Something the matter there, sport?” Mom asked, reaching over and slapping Eddie's sister on the back.

“You know I hate this stuff,” she replied.

“At least eat your chicken,” said Mom. “It'll put hair on your chest!”

Eddie couldn't help but giggle girlishly at the thought of his sister having a hairy chest.

“Oh, grow up Eddie,” chided Dad. “It's just an expression. Now let's change the topic to something happier. What did you do in school today, Eddie?”

“Me and Dave had cheerleader practice,” said Eddie, pausing to smooth out some wrinkles in his skirt. “It was like, totally awesome too! I did this rockin' aerial. And, oh my gawd, this totally incredible basket-toss that, like, you absolutely had to be there to see!”

Dad smiled, remembering his own long-forgotten glory days as a high school cheerleader. It made him proud to see Eddie following his footsteps, wearing the skirt and cheering for the same high school he himself had attended. Seeing his son so full of pep and school spirit made the old man forget his current lackluster life as a mild mannered secretary and housewife.

“I'd love to see you and the other boys do your routine,” Dad said gently.

“And I'd love to see the damned football team win a game,” growled Mom. “Eddie, you and the boys look cute in your uniforms and are obviously cheering your little hearts out. But honestly, can't the girls on the team win a game for once? What's their record now: two and six? Someone should whip those girls into shape, so they start winning games!”

“Now, now, dear!” chided Dad gently. “Here, have some more chicken.”

info.description:
Alright! I find the Swaps in this website mostly are body swaps or body part swaps. So, I'm introducing a new kind of swap.
Firstly, no gay or lesbian stuff
Second, sex is okay so long as it is not good detailed.
Third, Please use good English and grammar.
Fourth, i am going to stress that if anyone does not follow this rules, i will delete their chapters.

So.....Now let's move on to the characters.
Main Character (Male) : Eddie. An average guy. Black hair and is pretty shy.
Mother: An unusually attractive woman who works as a sectary
Father: A strong man who is a boss of an electric company
Sister: Very popular, cheerleader. Usually teases you.

Friends
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dave: A slightly more than average looking guy. Eddie's best friend
Tricia: A shy girl who has a crush on Eddie but does not let him know it
Gyn. A rather pretty girl who Eddie has a crush on. Quite popular.

Storyline
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
